entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near Fernie. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
